## Daily Schedule Overview

The workshop follows a structured daily format designed to maximize learning while accommodating different time zones and work schedules.

### Typical Day Structure

::: {.schedule-table}
| Time (EAT) | Duration | Session Type |
|------------|----------|--------------|
| 09:00 - 09:30 | 30 min | Welcome & Coffee |
| 09:30 - 11:00 | 90 min | Morning Lecture |
| 11:00 - 11:15 | 15 min | Break |
| 11:15 - 12:45 | 90 min | Practical Session I |
| 12:45 - 14:00 | 75 min | Lunch Break |
| 14:00 - 15:30 | 90 min | Afternoon Lecture |
| 15:30 - 15:45 | 15 min | Break |
| 15:45 - 17:00 | 75 min | Practical Session II |
| 17:00 - 17:30 | 30 min | Q&A and Wrap-up |
:::

## Virtual Participation

For those joining virtually:

- All sessions will be live-streamed via Zoom
- Recorded sessions available within 24 hours
- Dedicated online support channel
- Virtual networking sessions scheduled
- Same access to servers and materials

::: {.callout-tip}
## Time Zone Considerations
- Primary schedule is in East Africa Time (EAT)
- Key sessions will be recorded for asynchronous viewing
- Support available across multiple time zones
:::

## What to Bring

### In-Person Participants
- Laptop with required software installed
- Power adapter and chargers
- Notebook and pen
- Water bottle
- Business cards for networking

### Virtual Participants
- Stable internet connection
- Headset with microphone
- Second monitor recommended
- Quiet workspace
